attributes.action: request that the Royal Society publicly disprove the quack pseudo scientific theories peddled by Derren Brown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent weeks Derren Brown has returned to our televisions and continues to deceive the British public. Unless his outlandish theories are challenged by an organisation of substance it is inevitable that a growing number of people will believe his lies. Therefore, it is vital that a reputable scientific organisation refute his claims now before his mis-education becomes wide spread.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
